name: Wind Fantasy: NeXus
storyline:
The “Wind Fantasy:NeXus” series is renowned for its expansive world-building, richly detailed characters, and thrilling plot twists. This sequel is meticulously crafted by the original Windsor development team at “FY Technology.”

In the new storyline, an unknown force disrupts the balance of creation, and players take on the role of the “Zoomer,” a being capable of wielding miraculous powers. Along the way, they encounter the enigmatic AI girl “Little Yemira” and join forces with the legendary heroes of the “Wings of Guilt.” Together, they embark on an epic journey to save the world.
summary:
Wind Fantasy:NeXus is a TBS game.
In collaboration with 10 Taiwan's popular VTuber in depth into the cooperation, tailored to create a dedicated main storyline and permanent presence in the game, the player will be together with them in the world of wind fantasy, and the legendary heroes together to embark on an epic adventure
